Margaret Mason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Mason 0 Margaret Mason (December 31, 1940 – March 26, 1999) was an American actress best remembered for her work on soap operas in the 1970s. Margaret_Mason ( December_31_,_1940 – March_26_,_1999 ) was an_American_actress_best remembered for her_work on soap_operas in the_1970s .
